title: Kissing up to the boss can increase employees' bad behavior in the workplace, study shows

title_detail.value: Kissing up to the boss can increase employees' bad behavior in the workplace, study shows

summary: 'Kissing up to the boss' at work may help boost employees' careers but it also depletes the employees' self-control resources, leaving them more susceptible to behaving badly in the workplace, a new study has found.

summary_detail.value: 'Kissing up to the boss' at work may help boost employees' careers but it also depletes the employees' self-control resources, leaving them more susceptible to behaving badly in the workplace, a new study has found.
